data.name: VR Animation Player
data.description:
Step into wonderful, immersive VR stories, hand painted and animated in VR with Quill by Smoothstep. These VR stories not only let you view a painting on a wall, but transport you into the painting itself. Experience expressive characters, fantastic creatures, and complete narratives in these VR animations.

The VR Animation Player lets you visit high quality immersive  animations from the comfort of Meta Quest TV, bringing you the best in immersive entertainment. 

These immersive animations are fully 6DOF, some including multiple viewpoints to let you change position within the art, and the ability for you to both “Pause” the story to take in every brush stroke, and “Start” to bring the story back to life! 

To create your own VR stories, test your hand in the VR illustration and animation tool, Quill by Smoothstep, available on the Rift platform. https://www.oculus.com/experiences/rift/5910229332328230/

Requires the latest version of Meta Quest TV.
